contributionDescription: I use this blockchain a lot, I think it's the future, it's a really cool project . I did a lot of transactions, voted in governance and went on quests .  I try to support the project in every possible way and help in its development. I have also mentioned the project many times in my Telegram channel, which has over 11 thousand subscribers
impactDescription: I've done posts on my telegram channel and tweeter, I also help newbies and advise to use Optimism specifically for convenient and safe storage of money and as a great option for exchange . I and my friends in the crypto world like this project a lot
pwFlaggedReason: This application should be flagged for violating the program rules 10.1 and 10.2 as the applicant states that their contribution is sending transactions and voting in governance, which are user interactions that are explicitly stated as not in scope for RetroPGF 3.
recategorizeReason: NO. The application is from an individual, not a project, as indicated by the use of "I" in the description of contributions and impact.
pwCategorySuggestions: Community Building, Developer Ecosystem, Governance & Tokens, User Experience & Adoption, Blockchain Infrastructure
